translation.en: [woman] The twin bond does exist.
translation.zh: ‎双胞胎间的心灵感应是真实存在的

translation.en: Identical twins start out as a whole.
translation.zh: ‎同卵双胞胎最初是一个整体

translation.en: And then they split.
And become two people.
When this happened to her,
it's like I'd lost my other half.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉仿佛失去了自己的另一半似的

translation.en: My other half's gone.
[man] It's a terrible experience to feel like
you don't have nobody there for you.
Nobody wants to take you in.
For me, the perfect home environment would have been
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 最完美的家庭环境应该是

translation.en: someone to be there to love me, take care for me, and, uh…
just having a sense of family.
-[man] It's all good? Okay. -Mm-hmm.
My name is Anthony Standifer.
I've been incarcerated since 2010
for second-degree murder and first-degree robbery.
[Anthony] My childhood was…
I wouldn't say the typical childhood.
My mother was addicted to drugs
for as long as I can remember.
My father, even though I knew who he was,
translation.zh: ‎我的父亲 虽然我知道他是谁

translation.en: he never chose to claim me as his son.
translation.zh: ‎但他从没承认过我是他儿子

translation.en: So I would see him from time to time,
but, you know, he would just treat me like…
translation.zh: ‎但是 你知道咯 他总是对我…

translation.en: a nobody.
Even though my mother was on drugs,
she was very loving.
Some of the best experiences I've had was with her.
translation.zh:
‎我的一部分最美好的回忆
‎都是和她一起经历的

translation.en: You know, she took me to different states, traveling with her,
translation.zh:
‎她带着我去各个不同的州
‎和她一起旅行

translation.en: being out on the lake, fishing.
So, I would say I've had good memories with her, you know?
translation.zh:
‎所以 我得说
‎我和她有过一些美好的回忆

translation.en: But… she was in and out.
translation.zh:
‎但是… ‎她总是行色匆匆
‎我和她在一起一两天

translation.en: I would see her, you know, for a day or two,
translation.zh:
‎她总是行色匆匆
‎我和她在一起一两天

translation.en: then I wouldn't see her for a couple of weeks.
translation.zh: ‎之后就几个星期都见不到她了

translation.en: [Anthony] You know, I ended up going into foster care
because I was living with my auntie
translation.zh: ‎因为当时我和我阿姨住在一起

translation.en: and she felt like she couldn't deal with me.
So, she just threw all my stuff in a trash bag
translation.zh:
‎于是 她把我的东西
‎全部扔进了一个垃圾袋

translation.en: and took me down to Division of Family Services,
translation.zh: ‎然后把我带到了家庭服务部

translation.en: and gave me over to the State.
For a kid to be, you know, just…
thrown away like that
from his family…
and…
it felt like no one loves him.
Yeah, that was definitely one of the worst times of my life.
translation.zh: ‎那绝对是我这辈子中的一段至暗时光

translation.en: At the time, she had sobered up and got off drugs.
translation.zh: ‎那时 她已经戒了毒 恢复了清醒

translation.en: She'd remarried, and I thought
that it would be a good opportunity for us to be together.
translation.zh: ‎这会是个一家团聚的好机会

translation.en: For us to finally have a chance to be a family.
But, once I moved back to Kansas City,
translation.zh: ‎但是 在搬回了堪萨斯城之后

translation.en: uh, that is definitely when all the trouble started.
Her husband at the time had a son.
He was 16,
and he had been involved with gangs.
Also, I had a brother,
my half-brother, with… through my mother.
He'd been involved in gangs.
They were definitely role models to me.
I didn't really have any role models at that time.
And…
I definitely looked up to a lot of the things they did.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很崇拜他们做的一些事

translation.en: If they were selling drugs, I wanted to sell drugs.
Um, if they was robbing,
then… then that's what I wanted to do.
I was at a place called McEwan School for Boys.
translation.zh:
‎我当时在一个叫做
‎麦克尤恩男子学校的地方

translation.en: Something like a juvenile penitentiary.
And, um…
I got called in to the office
and so, she hands the phone over to me,
and it was my mother.
And she tells me that, uh…
that my brother had been murdered… that night.
translation.zh: ‎我哥哥被人杀了… ‎就在那天晚上

translation.en: Yeah.
When I left juvenile,
you know, um…
now with my brother gone, you know,
I wasn't the same person.
Um, I adopted an attitude…
that I didn't care about anything or anybody.
translation.zh: ‎漠不关心 麻木不仁的态度生活

translation.en: And…
once I adopted that attitude, and that mindset,
translation.zh: ‎抱着这样的态度 ‎有了那样的心态之后

translation.en: it allowed me to do
whatever I want without having no regard to the consequences.
translation.zh: ‎随心所欲 任意妄为 ‎完全不顾后果

translation.en: I just didn't care anymore.
I wasn't working.
She wasn't working, so we was in desperate need of money.
translation.zh: ‎她也没有工作 所以 ‎我们急需要钱

translation.en: I was out one night,
and I got a call from a guy
that I'd previously been involved in robberies together.
translation.zh: ‎是个之前和我一起打劫的家伙打来的

translation.en: His name was Jay Nicks.
And he calls me and says,
"Hey, do you wanna rob this drug dealer?"
translation.zh: ‎“嘿 你想去打劫某个毒贩子吗？”

translation.en: I said, "Well, how much is involved?"
He says, "About 80 grand."
"And the guys have, like, 50 or so pounds of marijuana."
translation.zh: ‎另外 那家伙有大概 ‎23公斤左右的大麻

translation.en: I say, "Yeah."
So I get off the phone with him,
make another call to a guy that I know, DJ.
translation.zh: ‎打了个电话给另一个我认识的人 DJ

translation.en: Me and DJ,
we get in the car, we head over to… to meet Jay Nicks.
translation.zh: ‎我们上了车 出发 ‎去见杰尼克斯

translation.en: Jay Nicks hands me a piece of paper. He says, "There's three addresses on it."
translation.zh:
‎杰尼克斯给了我一张纸 他说：
‎“上面有三个地址”

translation.en: He says, "The house should look like this,
and the guy's driving an orange Dodge Magnum
translation.zh: ‎那家伙开的是一辆橙色的“大道奇”

translation.en: on some 24-inch rims."
He says, "You can't miss it."
I said, "All right." He gives me the gun.
translation.zh: ‎我说：“好的” 他把枪给了我

translation.en: So, we're driving around the neighborhood.
We can't find the addresses.
We can't find this orange Dodge Magnum.
translation.zh: ‎我们找不到那辆橙色的“大道奇”

translation.en: So, I get out
and I start scouring the neighborhood on foot.
I end up finding the house.
translation.zh: ‎最后 我找到了那栋房子

translation.en: I call Jay Nicks.
I say, "Hey, I found the house,
translation.zh: ‎我说：“嘿 我找到那房子了

translation.en: but there's no Dodge Magnum out front."
I said, "What other kind of car do they have?"
And he names the car
that's identical to the one that's in the driveway.
translation.zh: ‎车道上的那辆完全符合描述

translation.en: So, me and DJ, we go to the front of the house,
translation.zh: ‎于是 我和DJ来到那栋房子前面

translation.en: and we kick the door in.
Once we kicked the door in,
the front room was pitch black.
But I could see somebody.
DJ grabs the person and slams them down to the ground.
translation.zh: ‎DJ抓住了那个人 将其击倒在地

translation.en: Once I reach for the lamp and turn it on,
translation.zh: ‎我碰到灯以后 把它打开

translation.en: I see a woman.
Once I seen that it was an older woman,
translation.zh: ‎我发现那是一个上了年纪的女人

translation.en: I immediately knew that this was the wrong house.
translation.zh: ‎我立马意识到 我们闯错地方了

translation.en: I take the gun, and while she's on the ground I stand over her.
translation.zh:
‎我拿起枪 她躺在地上的时候
‎我就站在她上方

translation.en: I tell DJ, "Well, finish searching the house,
maybe we're mistaken."
He comes back, he says, "There's nothing back there."
translation.zh: ‎他回来后说：“后面什么也没有”

translation.en: So…
I'm thinking, now, that…
I just got off parole.
I don't want to go back to prison.
She's seen my face.
So, I thought…
"Okay… well, Imma kill her."
[Anthony exhales] I stand over her,
and pull the trigger.
One time.
And, um…
I ask myself,
"Why did I do that?"
And…
every day, there is no answer that makes sense.
translation.zh: ‎每一天 我都找不到一个合理的答案

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
-[woman 1] How are you? -[woman 2] Good. How are you?
No, we can use this for the chicken fried steaks.
-Here you go. -[woman 3] Okay.
[woman 4] Are they still hot, Sharon?
You brought the food. You sit down and relax.
translation.zh: ‎你把食物拿过来了 ‎你坐下休息吧

translation.en: -[woman 3] That looks good. -[woman 4] Absolutely.
[woman 2] We were a very tight-knit family.
translation.zh: ‎我们是一个非常亲密的家庭

translation.en: We did… everything together.
[woman 3] They're trying to make me fat at work.
[woman 2] We didn't necessarily have everything,
but we had everything we needed.
translation.zh: ‎但所需的一切 我们都有了

translation.en: And I couldn't ask for better.
-Do you want some salad? -Hmm?
Do you want some?
[woman 2] My name's Dana Crowl.
Beverly's my mom.
Growing up, my family was mainly me,
translation.zh: ‎从小到大 我们家 ‎主要有我

translation.en: my brothers, and my sister, with my mom.
translation.zh: ‎我的兄弟们 还有我妹妹跟我妈妈

translation.en: Our parents were divorced, so we didn't see him as often…
translation.zh:
‎我们的爸妈离婚了
‎所以我们并不能如愿…

translation.en: as we probably would have liked to.
But, Mom was our support. She did everything for us.
translation.zh:
‎但是 妈妈是我们的支柱
‎她为我们付出了一切

translation.en: My mom was very nurturing. She…
was probably the huggiest person I've ever met.
translation.zh: ‎可能是我见过最喜欢拥抱的人了

translation.en: -Always touching you. -[Dana] Holding your hand.
If you're sitting there, she's just like this…
translation.zh: ‎如果你坐在那儿 她就会…

translation.en: "Sweetie."
You do the same thing though.
-You do. Yeah, you do the same thing. -[man] Yeah.
[Dana] She never made us feel like we were bothersome to her.
translation.zh:
‎她从来不会让我们觉得
‎自己是她的累赘

translation.en: I think it's important to let your kids know you want them
translation.zh:
‎我认为 让自己的孩子感受到
‎你很需要他们

translation.en: and you want them around you.
translation.zh: ‎你希望他们在你身边 这是很重要的

translation.en: She joined the police in 1976,
and she worked at the Independence Police Department.
She was a records clerk.
She helped officers write their reports, so she heard everything bad that happened.
translation.zh: ‎她负责帮警官们写报告 ‎所以她听过一切的人世黑暗

translation.en: And we didn't get to do anything
because she wasn't gonna have her kids out there causing trouble.
translation.zh:
‎因为她不会允许自己的孩子
‎在外面惹是生非

translation.en: The day I found out about Mom was March 19th, it was a Friday.
translation.zh:
‎我得知妈妈的噩耗 是在3月19日
‎那天是周五

translation.en: I was getting ready for work. It was about twenty after 7:00.
translation.zh: ‎我正准备去上班 当时是7点20分 ‎（欢迎）

translation.en: And my phone rang, and it was my brother-in-law Steve,
translation.zh: ‎我的电话响了起来 是我妹夫史蒂夫

translation.en: and he said, "I just talked to Aunt Barbara."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“我刚刚和芭芭拉姨妈通过话”

translation.en: "She asked me if I could stop by your mom's house."
translation.zh: ‎“她问我能不能去你妈妈家一趟”

translation.en: "Something doesn't look right over there."
And I turned onto her street,
and I could see that the screen door was standing open.
And I stuck my head in.
I didn't even walk into the living room,
and I could see her laying there.
And I just leaned back out and closed the door.
And I had my phone in my hand and I called 911.
translation.zh: ‎我手里拿着手机 于是我打了911

translation.en: And it wasn't two minutes later
that officers were there.
The impact of losing our mom on my family has been immeasurable.
translation.zh:
‎失去妈妈
‎对我们家造成的冲击不可估量

translation.en: I-- It's so big, I can't even really explain it.
translation.zh: ‎冲击太大了 我甚至无法阐释它

translation.en: She's like a guiding soul in my life.
translation.zh: ‎她是我生命中的灵魂引路人

translation.en: Every day I drive by the cemetery, I say hi to her.
translation.zh: ‎我每天开车经过墓地 都会跟她说嗨

translation.en: Every morning I tell her good morning.
translation.zh: ‎每天早上我都会跟她说早安

translation.en: I don't like to use the word "monster," but there it is.
translation.zh:
‎我不喜欢用“恶魔”这个词
‎但事实如此

translation.en: In my heart, he's a monster.
translation.zh: ‎在我心里 他就是个恶魔

translation.en: In an ideal world, he will die behind bars and never see the light of day again.
translation.zh:
‎在理想的世界里 他会死在监狱里
‎永远不见天日

translation.en: I don't know what made him pull the trigger.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道是什么促使他扣下了扳机

translation.en: I wish I did.
translation.zh:
‎我希望我知道
‎那样也许我能更地理解

translation.en: Maybe I'd understand a little better and be able to forgive him, if I knew why.
translation.zh:
‎我希望我知道
‎那样也许我能更地理解 ‎也许能原谅他 如果我知道原因的话

translation.en: It's a mindset I will never understand.
translation.zh: ‎这是一种我永远无法理解的心态

translation.en: That's not the world I grew up in.
I think he was raised in a world where that was just the way things are.
translation.zh: ‎我想他就是在一个那样的世界长大的

translation.en: And part of me feels bad for him living in a world like that, but
translation.zh:
‎我一方面为他生活在那样的世界
‎而感到难过 但是

translation.en: you don't have to be a product of what brought you up.
translation.zh: ‎但是你也可以出淤泥而不染啊

translation.en: You can make a different choice,
and I don't think he made a different choice.
translation.zh: ‎我不认为他做了不同的选择

translation.en: And he had the option…
to not live the life he lived.
[woman] Let's go.
Say hi to the guys.
I'm Susan Thompson, I'm Anthony Standifer's auntie.
translation.zh:
‎我是苏珊汤普森
‎我是安东尼斯坦德菲尔的姨妈

translation.en: Come here, Diamond. Come here, girl.
translation.zh: ‎过来 钻石 过来 宝贝

translation.en: Say hi.
Anthony grew up midtown,
in the middle of the hood.
It was a rough area.
Anthony's dad was very controlling.
He was just very abusive,
very, um… Putting his mom down, putting him down.
translation.zh: ‎他会辱骂他妈妈 辱骂他

translation.en: "You're nothing, your mom's nothing."
translation.zh: ‎“你什么都不是 你妈妈什么都不是”

translation.en: He just went through a lot of verbal abuse.
And I think it affected Anthony in a big way, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这对安东尼斯的影响非常深远

translation.en: He had experienced the violence in the home, you know.
He had experienced the drugs.
Anthony's dad left the house
translation.zh: ‎在小安东尼斯差不多三、四岁时

translation.en: when little Anthony was about three or four.
And, from that, everything just kind of went downhill.
translation.zh: ‎从那之后 所有事都开始走下坡路

translation.en: Anthony's mom would allow the drug-pushers to take over her house, you know?
translation.zh:
‎安东尼斯的妈妈允许毒贩
‎占用了她的房子

translation.en: Her house would become the spot.
She was in the streets, she was doing drugs, she was here, she was there.
translation.zh:
‎她露宿街头、她吸毒、
‎她一会儿在这儿、一会儿在那儿、

translation.en: She was everywhere, you know? You couldn't put your hand on her.
translation.zh: ‎她到处乱跑 你根本抓不住她

translation.en: It just wasn't a healthy situation.
My mom took little Anthony on.
translation.zh:
‎我妈妈承担起了
‎照顾小安东尼斯的责任

translation.en: It lasted maybe a month or two,
and my mom was
moving out of town and I was left with little Anthony.
translation.zh:
‎就搬离了城里
‎把小安东尼斯留给了我

translation.en: I also had six children of my own.
One of my sons had cerebral palsy. He didn't walk or talk.
translation.zh:
‎我有个患有脑瘫的儿子
‎他不会走路或说话

translation.en: So I wasn't in a position to devote my attention
translation.zh: ‎所以我没有足够的精力 ‎分给小安东尼斯 虽然他很需要

translation.en: towards little Anthony, as far as what he needed.
translation.zh: ‎分给小安东尼斯 虽然他很需要

translation.en: 'Cause he definitely needed one-on-one.
translation.zh: ‎因为他确实需要一对一的陪伴

translation.en: This kid's been exposed to a lot, you know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: ‎这个孩子经历了很多 ‎我不希望我自己的孩子受到影响

translation.en: And I didn't want that shit to rub off on my kids at the house.
translation.zh: ‎我不希望我自己的孩子受到影响

translation.en: This particular day I was like, "Hell, no. I ain't gonna be able to handle him."
translation.zh: ‎有一天 我想：“不行 我管不了他了”

translation.en: "So I'll go down here to the State building, Juvenile Justice Center."
translation.zh: ‎“我要去市政厅 去青少年司法中心”

translation.en: And I tell 'em, "Hey, yo, I got this kid."
translation.zh: ‎我告诉他们：“嘿 我这儿有个小孩”

translation.en: "My sister's on drugs, you know? You guys need to get her a court order."
translation.zh:
‎“我妹妹有毒瘾
‎你们得给她弄张法院责令”

translation.en: This is what I'm thinking. They're gonna get a court order,
translation.zh:
‎我就是这么想的
‎他们会弄张法院责令

translation.en: drag her in here, make her get herself cleaned up
and I'm gonna have her and her son and I'm gonna reunite them back together.
translation.zh:
‎然后她会回来 她儿子也会回来
‎我会让他们重新相聚

translation.en: And that wasn't the case. She never responded to the courts.
translation.zh:
‎但事实并非如此
‎她从未对法庭做出回应

translation.en: Little Anthony then went into foster care.
translation.zh: ‎后来小安东尼斯就去了寄养家庭

translation.en: And, uh…
he was molested in foster care.
It breaks my heart to know that, uh…
that I even had anything to do with what he was subjected to.
translation.zh: ‎是和我有一定关系的 我倍感心碎

translation.en: Had I never put him in the State's custody,
translation.zh: ‎要是我没有把他交给州政府照顾

translation.en: you know, we'd probably have a whole different young man today,
translation.zh:
‎我们今天也许
‎会看到一个不一样的年轻人

translation.en: because all that did was made him even more messed up in his head.
translation.zh:
‎因为那段经历给他的心理造成了
‎更多的创伤

translation.en: He started hanging out with street guys, older guys than him, doing things.
translation.zh:
‎他开始和一些地痞流氓
‎一些比他年长的人混在一起 搞事情

translation.en: It just was like an adrenaline rush for him.
translation.zh: ‎这对他来说能让肾上腺素飙升

translation.en: He was easily influenced. He was… uh, gullible.
translation.zh:
‎他轻易就受到了影响
‎他…太轻信别人了

translation.en: He wanted to belong.
They made him feel loved in a way that we have never have.
translation.zh:
‎他们让他感受到了
‎我们从未给过他的爱

translation.en: So I could easily see how he went along with the plan.
translation.zh: ‎所以不难看出 他是如何步步深陷的

translation.en: We've never made him feel that.
translation.zh: ‎我们从未让他感受过那样的爱

translation.en: From the time the kid hit the pavement,
he was labeled "bad."
From the time they knew who his daddy was, he was labeled "bad."
translation.zh:
‎从大家得知他爸爸是谁时起
‎他就被打上了坏人的标签

translation.en: From the time they knew his mom had an addiction,
translation.zh: ‎从大家知道他妈妈有毒瘾时起

translation.en: he was labeled "fucked up."
You know? And so on and so forth.
translation.zh: ‎你明白吗？还有许多诸如此类的事

translation.en: And then we wonder why.
"How do people grow up and act like this and do things like this?"
translation.zh:
‎怎么会有人在这种环境中长大
‎会有这样的行为 会做这样的事？

translation.en: Well, hell…
take a look at the whole picture.
And then ask yourself, "What did you do to help him?"
translation.zh:
‎然后扪心自问一下
‎你做过什么事去帮助他？

translation.en: "What did you do?"
Nothin'.
I did not want anything to do with him because I was mad at him
translation.zh:
‎我当时不想和他扯上任何关系
‎因为我在生他的气

translation.en: 'cause I didn't understand.
But now I sit here before y'all,
translation.zh: ‎但现在 我坐在你们大家面前

translation.en: and it's like, "Yeah,
all of us," you know?
We failed him.
We failed him,
as a whole. It's not this person, that person, or that person.
translation.zh:
‎大家一起 不是这个人、
‎那个人、或那个人

translation.en: His dad, his mom, this--
We, as a whole, as a family, failed him,
translation.zh: ‎是我们 所有人 他的家人 辜负了他

translation.en: you know what I'm saying?
[man] Gangs provide comfort.
It provides a family that you don't have.
translation.zh: ‎他给了你一个你不曾拥有的家

translation.en: People become your brother.
Some people become your father figure.
translation.zh: ‎有的人成为了你父亲般的人物

translation.en: They try to teach you how to do things right.
translation.zh: ‎他们试图教给你如何把事情做好

translation.en: But, you know, we're knuckleheads. That's why we joined the gang.
translation.zh:
‎但要知道 我们是群笨蛋
‎所以我们才会加入帮派

translation.en: My name is Valentino Barraza.
I've known Anthony Standifer
since we was 14 or 15 years old.
You know, and now to this day,
we're still friends.
And we'll probably be still friends to the end.
translation.zh: ‎我们大概这辈子都会是朋友

translation.en: Anthony, as a gang member,
translation.zh: ‎安东尼 作为一名帮派成员

translation.en: his character was more of, like…
translation.zh: ‎他的性格更趋于 可以说… ‎（瓦伦蒂诺巴拉萨 安东尼之友）

translation.en: like, super crazy.
You know, it's like,
he was always ready,
whether it was to rob somebody, or steal some cars.
translation.zh: ‎要么去打劫 要么去偷车

translation.en: I ain't never seen him scared of nothin'.
translation.zh: ‎我从没见过他害怕什么东西

translation.en: I don't care what it was.
If we was gonna go in a house full of people with guns,
translation.zh:
‎如果我们要拿着枪
‎冲进一间挤满了人的房子

translation.en: he'd be the first one going through that house. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他一定是第一个冲进去的人

translation.en: You know, he was a crazy individual.
Very crazy.
Like, unstable.
Yeah, I feel bad for what happened and everything, you know?
translation.zh: ‎是的 我对发生的一切感到很难过 ‎我向他们的家人致以哀悼

translation.en: My condolence to their family and everything.
But, whenever you're… committing a crime where there's home invasion or anything,
translation.zh:
‎但是 当你犯罪时
‎比如入室抢劫之类的

translation.en: you know, sometimes… people don't want to leave…
no type of evidence and…
and witnesses, I mean…
When you go to war,
there's casualties no matter what.
Whether it's… whether you find the enemy,
or… just bystanders.
[man] This crime ranked high on the list as being a very heinous crime.
translation.zh:
‎这起案件在十恶不赦排行榜上
‎名列前茅

translation.en: This lady was basically executed in her house.
translation.zh:
‎这位女士可以说是
‎在自己家里遭到了处决

translation.en: My name's Michael Johann.
I'm a retired detective of the Independence, Missouri Police Department,
translation.zh:
‎我是密苏里警局
‎自治区警察部的退休警探

translation.en: and I was the lead detective on the Beverly Crowl homicide.
translation.zh:
‎我曾是贝芙莉克劳尔谋杀案的
‎主管警探

translation.en: [Mike] Coming back here after 11 years triggers some emotions.
translation.zh: ‎11年后故地重游 让人感慨万千

translation.en: There was no reason to kill her.
I just felt like we had to get these people,
'cause if you can kick a door open in the middle of the night
translation.zh:
‎因为如果你能三更半夜
‎踢门闯入别人家

translation.en: and kill a little defenseless lady,
translation.zh:
‎将一位身材娇小
‎手无寸铁的女士杀害

translation.en: who's next?
[Mike] Okay.
Anthony, I think you'll remember myself and Detective Ken Forrester?
translation.zh:
‎安东尼 我想你还记得
‎我和肯弗雷斯特警探吧？

translation.en: My name's Mike. Uh, just to reiterate…
-I gave you your rights earlier today. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎我今天早些时候给过你权利告知表

translation.en: [Mike] You signed 'em. You still remember those rights?
translation.zh:
‎你已经签过名了
‎你还记得那些权利吗？

translation.en: You still have a right-- All those rights are still in effect.
translation.zh:
‎你还有你的权利…
‎你的所有权利都仍然有效

translation.en: [Anthony] Listen, the bottom line is this--
The bottom line: your ass is in deep doo-doo.
[Anthony] I don't know how. These people are implicating me in something--
translation.zh:
‎我不知道怎么会这样
‎这些人让我卷入了一些…

translation.en: [Mike] You know what? You--
Anthony obviously came in lying and denying everything.
translation.zh: ‎很明显 安东尼满口谎言 否认了一切

translation.en: -Where is this evidence? -Some of it's in your house.
translation.zh:
‎-证据在哪里？
‎-你家里有一部分

translation.en: [Ken] We're not gonna go over all this evidence.
translation.zh: ‎我们不会把证据都全部检查一遍

translation.en: Of a-- of a murder?
Of a murder? No. I don't think so.
translation.zh: ‎杀人的证据？不 我不这么认为

translation.en: Ain't no murder 'cause I ain't did no murder.
Yeah, you did.
-You did. -[Anthony] I'm already guilty--
translation.zh:
‎-你有
‎-我在你们眼中已经是有罪的人…

translation.en: [Mike] He was a very difficult person to interrogate.
First of all, why'd I kill this lady?
translation.zh: ‎首先 你为什么要杀那位女士？

translation.en: [Ken] Tell me you weren't there that night.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我 你那天晚上不在那里

translation.en: There, where?
-[Ken] Where the lady got killed. -Listen--
translation.zh:
‎-那位女士被杀害的地方
‎-听着…

translation.en: -[Ken] Tell me you weren't there. -I was not there.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉我 你当时不在那里
‎-我不在那里

translation.en: [Ken] That's bullshit--
[Mike] He's been in and out of prison. He knows the ropes.
translation.zh:
‎他一直在监狱进进出出
‎他对办案流程很熟悉

translation.en: You're not gonna be able to use emotional tactics with him,
and get him to feel sorry for the victim or anything like that.
translation.zh: ‎让他对受害者感到歉疚之类的

translation.en: So we presented him with facts that kept showing him that…
translation.zh:
‎所以我们跟他讲事实
‎事实能让他明白…

translation.en: we could prove he was the perpetrator of this homicide of Beverly Crowl.
translation.zh:
‎我们有证据证明
‎他就是杀害贝芙莉克劳尔的凶手

translation.en: We don't deal with--
-Okay, okay, okay… -We don't deal…
What can I do to prove to you that I'm giving you my word as a man?
translation.zh:
‎我要做什么 才能向你们证明
‎我说的都是真话？

translation.en: What do I have to do? I'm telling you, I'm not owning…
translation.zh:
‎我要怎么…？我跟你们说了
‎我他妈没有…

translation.en: [Ken] Anthony, you're asking questions.
translation.zh: ‎安东尼 你现在在问问题

translation.en: [Mike] Later on during the interrogation he asked to see his girlfriend.
translation.zh:
‎在后来的调查中
‎他要求要见他女朋友

translation.en: And we told him that that could be arranged.
translation.zh: ‎我们告诉他这件事我们可以安排

translation.en: She had given a complete confession and had implicated Anthony in the murder.
translation.zh:
‎她对一切供认不讳
‎并且暗示安东尼和谋杀有关

translation.en: Then it became a bargaining tool that we used.
translation.zh: ‎这后来成为了我们讨价还价的工具

translation.en: We told him, "You're not seeing her till you give us something."
translation.zh:
‎我们说：“在你说出有用的消息前
‎你不能见她”

translation.en: "You're gonna have to tell us something about the murder of Beverly Crowl
translation.zh:
‎“你必须告诉我们关于
‎贝芙莉克劳尔谋杀案的有用消息

translation.en: before we even allow you to see her."
That's when he seemed to let his guard down some
and he started giving us details about the murder that he had committed.
translation.zh: ‎开始告诉我们他杀人的细节

translation.en: Who searched the house?
I did. I did.
Okay. Then what?
And I knew it was the wrong house. I knew it.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我们找错地方了 我知道了

translation.en: Without a doubt.
[Mike] And you shot her?
Yes or no?
-Yes or no? -Yeah.
[Mike] My thoughts about Anthony Standifer as a person
translation.zh: ‎我对安东尼斯坦德菲尔的看法是

translation.en: is that he's a cold-blooded psychopathic killer.
translation.zh: ‎他是一个冷血的变态杀人犯

translation.en: He executed Beverly.
After he executed her,
he got back in the car with his accomplices and said that…
translation.zh: ‎他和他的同伙回到车上 他说…

translation.en: chalk another one up on his belt.
So there's a strong possibility that he's killed before.
translation.zh: ‎所以他极有可能以前就杀过人了

translation.en: [man] Once we become older,
you know what gives us joy?
translation.zh: ‎知道什么能让我们感到快乐吗？

translation.en: Seeing our nieces, and our grandchildren, and our children
translation.zh:
‎看到自己的侄女、自己的孙子孙女、
‎还有自己的孩子们

translation.en: laugh with their children,
and their children's children.
translation.zh: ‎他们孩子的孩子们一起放声大笑

translation.en: That is the greatest joy in the world.
And when my nephew Anthony murdered that lady,
translation.zh: ‎在我侄子安东尼杀了那位女士之后

translation.en: he stole that from her.
Anthony wanted to try to live
that particular lifestyle.
If you live that particular lifestyle,
translation.zh: ‎如果你要过那种不同寻常的日子

translation.en: that's what that particular lifestyle brings.
translation.zh: ‎那这就是那种日子给你的下场

translation.en: Violence brings violence. It's just that simple.
translation.zh: ‎暴力只会滋生暴力 就这么简单

translation.en: It's not complicated.
Several years after his brother's murdered
translation.zh: ‎在他哥哥被一个嗑了药的朋友

translation.en: by one of his friends, high,
Anthony walks into a house, doesn't find a dope dealer,
translation.zh: ‎安东尼闯进别人家里 没找到毒贩子

translation.en: finds some old lady and murders her.
translation.zh: ‎而是发现一位老妇人 然后杀了她

translation.en: Murders beget murders.
That lifestyle begets that lifestyle.
translation.zh:
‎一种生活方式只会带来
‎同一种生活方式

translation.en: Hopelessness, despair…
not having…
a group or organization that says to you,
translation.zh: ‎没有一个团体和组织 ‎会来告诉你：

translation.en: "We have a place for you amongst our ranks."
translation.zh: ‎“我们的队伍中有你的一席之地”

translation.en: "And you can move up through the ranks."
The… the more violent you are,
the faster you will move up in the ranks.
Well, there's nothing cool about shooting people and murdering people,
and scaring children.
Being a gang member is not like… [chuckles] …being a bus driver.
translation.zh: ‎帮派成员和公车司机完全不是一回事

translation.en: It's not a safe occupation.
I keep seeing these videos where they glamorize.
translation.zh: ‎我总是看到一些美化他们的影视

translation.en: [mimics] "I got a car, and I'm gonna be a dope dealer,
and I got hookers, and I got hoes."
"I got parties and I'm gonna--"
[normal voice] Okay.
Right.
You're gonna do all of that.
Right.
Okay. Good luck with that.
I love my nephew.
I love him today.
Nothing will ever stop me from loving him.
translation.zh: ‎没有什么能够阻止我对他的爱

translation.en: I don't care about his crazy father.
I don't care about his crazy mother,
or any other of the crazies in his life.
translation.zh: ‎或者任何一个他生命中遇到过的疯子

translation.en: I love him.
I will always love him.
But what he did was heinous and unforgivable.
translation.zh: ‎但他的所作所为令人发指 不可原谅

translation.en: Period.
[woman] When he made that choice, he not only affected Beverly,
translation.zh: ‎在他做出了那样的选择后 ‎他不仅影响了贝芙莉

translation.en: it affected her family,
it affected him,
it affected his family,
friends.
A ripple effect that just goes on and on and on.
My name is Barbara Lou Draper.
Beverly Sue Crowl was my twin sister.
translation.zh: ‎贝芙莉苏克劳尔是我的双胞胎妹妹

translation.en: I was the oldest by ten minutes.
When we was growing up,
we were basically together all the time.
When you saw one, you saw the other one.
translation.zh: ‎你看到一个 就会看到另一个

translation.en: It confused people, and they didn't know which was which.
translation.zh: ‎大家总是很迷惑 分不清我们谁是谁

translation.en: There was a few times when we were older and dating,
translation.zh: ‎我们长大谈恋爱后 有几次

translation.en: we switched on 'em.
[chuckles] Guys.
That was fun.
Just typical kids, you know.
We were close.
We've always lived in this town.
I've lived here several years,
then the house across the street came up for sale and…
translation.zh: ‎后来街对面的房子挂牌出售了…

translation.en: and she bought it.
And moved in.
I would look out the window
and she'd be out there in the yard, putzing around doing something.
translation.zh: ‎会看到她在花园里闲散地做着什么事

translation.en: I talked to her every day.
She would call over here, invite me over for supper.
translation.zh: ‎她会打电话过来 叫我过去吃晚饭

translation.en: "Be quick," she'd say.
And that's what happened that night.
I'd been over there. She called me over for supper, and I went over.
translation.zh:
‎我去过她家 她打电话叫我去吃晚饭
‎我过去了…

translation.en: We sat there and had supper, and we watched television.
translation.zh: ‎我们一起吃了晚饭、看了电视

translation.en: She told me she had two bananas laying on the kitchen counter,
translation.zh: ‎她厨房的柜台上有两个香蕉

translation.en: I'll never forget 'em, they were dark.
translation.zh: ‎我永远忘不掉它们 它们已经发黑了

translation.en: Said she was gonna make banana bread in the morning.
And, anyway she watched me home.
We waved at each other at the front door.
That's the last time I saw her.
My thoughts on the person that did this…
not very high.
I don't think much of him.
But I realize that, you know, he's a human being like the rest of us,
translation.zh:
‎但我知道
‎他是和我们大家一样的普通人

translation.en: but that doesn't excuse what he did.
translation.zh: ‎但这并不能为他的行为开脱

translation.en: 'Cause he had a choice, and he didn't have to make that choice.
translation.zh: ‎他有其他的选择 但他没有那么做

translation.en: The values and morals that we were raised with,
translation.zh: ‎我们从小耳濡目染的价值观、道德观

translation.en: I think that teaching goes generation to generation.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这种教化是代代相传的

translation.en: Or it should.
'Cause, you know,
Mom and Dad's older,
wiser,
lived through more stuff.
And kids need… younger people need to listen to 'em.
translation.zh:
‎孩子们需要…
‎年轻人需要听从他们的建议

translation.en: 'Cause the kids, I think, are better off for it.
translation.zh: ‎因为 我认为这样对孩子来说会更好

translation.en: It's all in the raising.
It's all in the raising.
[woman] Drugs have taken a toll on my life.
It's just another escape.
translation.zh: ‎这不过是另一种逃避的方式

translation.en: That's all it is.
Escaping the reality of some chaos or pressure on your life.
translation.zh: ‎逃避现实生活中的混乱或压力

translation.en: It's nobody's responsibility but your own.
translation.zh: ‎那不是任何人的责任 全都在你自己

translation.en: My name's Cassandra Jenny Reed, and I am Anthony's mother.
translation.zh:
‎我叫卡桑德拉珍妮里德
‎我是安东尼的妈妈

translation.en: Me and Anthony, our relationship was wonderful.
Always making each other laugh.
When I couldn't get out of bed, Anthony, at five years old,
translation.zh:
‎我下不了床的时候
‎当时才五岁的安东尼

translation.en: Anthony would bring me breakfast in bed.
He got up… got up on a chair, pulled a chair up to the stove,
translation.zh: ‎他把椅子拉到灶炉边 站在椅子上

translation.en: and scrambled me some eggs.
And went outside and got some of those little yellow daisies,
translation.zh:
‎然后跑出去
‎摘回来一些黄色的小菊花

translation.en: and put them on a tray,
and bought it with--
He was just that thoughtful of me.
"Mama, you gonna be okay," he said.
translation.zh: ‎他说：“妈妈 你会好起来的”

translation.en: "Here, you need to eat."
I'm telling you, he's always been amazing to me.
translation.zh: ‎我跟你说 他对我一向都是这么好

translation.en: I've missed a lot of time with Anthony.
translation.zh: ‎我错过了很多和安东尼一起的时光

translation.en: 'Cause I…
I had to get away from here.
So, and, uh…
I couldn't take him with me.
I can truly, honestly say
if I hadn't abandoned him when I did,
when I left him with my family…
'Cause they always called him bad.
And he knows I've not ever called him bad…
translation.zh: ‎但他知道 我永远不会说他是坏孩子

translation.en: you know.
I think that has… That has a lot to do with it deep down.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得归根结底
‎今时今日的结果和这很有关系

translation.en: [voice breaks] Okay, I'm through. I can't do this no more.
translation.zh: ‎好了 够了 我说不下去了

translation.en: [Anthony] I don't have any hard feelings towards my family
translation.zh: ‎我对我的家人完全没有怨气

translation.en: on the mistakes that they made in raising me.
translation.zh: ‎我不怨恨他们在养育我时犯过的错误

translation.en: You know, I… [hesitates]
I guess they just didn't, you know, know any better.
translation.zh:
‎我猜他们只是不知道
‎还能有更好的做法

translation.en: I don't want to solely put it on upbringing.
translation.zh: ‎我不想单纯地把这归结于抚养方式

translation.en: That's definitely a strong contributing factor,
translation.zh: ‎这是一个很重要的因素 但是

translation.en: but I have to take accountability, you know,
translation.zh:
‎责任主要在我 ‎因为我犯下那样的罪行时
‎我已经25岁了

translation.en: because at that time when I committed this crime, I was 25 years old.
translation.zh:
‎因为我犯下那样的罪行时
‎我已经25岁了

translation.en: So, I knew right from wrong and I knew what I was doing was wrong,
translation.zh:
‎我能够分辨是非
‎我知道自己做的事是错的

translation.en: so I had a choice, and I chose not to do the right thing.
translation.zh: ‎所以我是有选择的 ‎但我选择了放弃光明

translation.en: How can I take another person's life unjustifiably for…
translation.zh:
‎我怎么能无缘无故
‎毫无意义且毫无理由地…

translation.en: senselessly and no reason,
and not regret that?
To think that I could kill a person,
you know, just because they saw my face, is ludicrous.
translation.zh:
‎只因为他们看到了我的脸
‎这太荒唐了

translation.en: And I…
can't wrap my head around, like, what,
excuse my language, what the hell was wrong with me? [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎原谅我的粗俗
‎我他妈是有什么毛病啊？

translation.en: And to make those kind of decisions, you know, um…
[sighs] It's… it's just disgusting.
I sincerely apologize, you know, and…
I wish… I wish… Every day I wish I could go back and do something different.
translation.zh:
‎每一天 我都希望能够时光倒流
‎重新做出不同的选择

translation.en: [Mike, on tape] My thoughts about Anthony Standifer as a person
translation.zh: ‎我对安东尼斯坦德菲尔的看法是

translation.en: is that he's a cold-blooded psychopathic killer.
translation.zh: ‎他是一个冷血的变态杀人犯

translation.en: He executed Beverly.
After he executed her,
he got back in the car with his accomplices and said that…
translation.zh: ‎他和他的同伙回到车上 他说…

translation.en: chalk another one up on his belt.
So there's a strong possibility that he's killed before.
translation.zh: ‎所以他极有可能以前就杀过人了

translation.en: I have not killed anyone before.
I think if that was true then I would be convicted of another murder.
translation.zh:
‎如果真有其事
‎我就会因另一起谋杀案而被判刑了

translation.en: You know, I think that's just a way to paint a picture
translation.zh: ‎我觉得那只是一种吹嘘自己的方式

translation.en: and try to put me in a box.
Everybody that was involved at that police department with the case,
translation.zh: ‎那个警局所有侦办这个案子的人

translation.en: they all knew her because they worked with her.
translation.zh: ‎他们都认识她 因为他们以前是同事

translation.en: They said that she was like a mother to them.
translation.zh: ‎他们说她就像他们的妈妈一样

translation.en: So, you know, that's why I believe the detective has such strong feelings.
translation.zh:
‎所以 这就是那位警探
‎会如此义愤填膺的原因

translation.en: I can't change opinions.
What I can change is my behaviors,
by being, you know, uh…
a good person, so to speak.
But, being in here, how do you know…
translation.zh: ‎但是 我身在这里 你们怎么知道…

translation.en: how do you know that I've become a good person?
translation.zh: ‎你们怎么知道我已经改过自新了？

translation.en: How do you know that I've changed?
translation.zh: ‎你们怎么会知道我已经变了？

translation.en: You know, I can sit here and tell you that. But…
translation.zh:
‎我可以坐在这里告诉你们我变了
‎但是…

translation.en: you will never know until I am released, right?
translation.zh:
‎在我被释放前
‎你们都不会知道真相的 对吧？

translation.en: And then I'm a productive member of society.
translation.zh: ‎到时候我作为社会劳动力的一员

translation.en: I have to do, you know, the right thing every day and just, you know, and…
translation.zh: ‎我每天都得做正确的事情 然后…

translation.en: and know that's good enough.
[man, on tape] This is where I live, this is where I exist.
translation.zh:
‎这是我生活的地方
‎这是我存在的地方

translation.en: I swung right up over his shoulder, into the side of his neck with that blade.
translation.zh:
‎我的刀从他肩膀上划过
‎刺进了他的颈部

translation.en: I was terrified. I just took somebody's life.
translation.zh: ‎我很害怕 我刚刚杀了人

translation.en: [woman] The scariest thing in the world is to know that somebody else
translation.zh:
‎这世上最可怕的事
‎就是知道你的性命

translation.en: is holding your life in their hands.
All that's holding my face together is metal plates.
translation.zh: ‎把我的脸固定在一起的只有金属板

translation.en: [man, on tape] I'm a very, very dangerous man.
translation.zh: ‎我是一个非常非常危险的人物

translation.en: I didn't say that I killed those people, I said that they were dead because of me.
translation.zh:
‎我没说我杀了那些人
‎我是说他们是因我而死的

translation.en: [man, on tape] I am who I am…
Just a killer.
